name: Marc W.
caption: Best app ever!
text: I really love this app! Now I don't have to forget the list I need for shopping!

name: Sammy F.
caption: Very convenient üòÅ
text: Much better than using paper and pencil!

name: Claire A.
caption: What I expected
text: Really appreciate the developers for feedback! Now I can edit my list in case I make mistakes.

name: Sarah W.
caption: Highly recommended
text: The app design looks really nice! It's really easy for me to organize and manage my list. I told my friends about it!

name: Angel H.
caption: Awesome
text: Bro! I can just check the item before deleting it. Better to check and uncheck in case something went wrong.

name: Justin K.
caption: App of the Year!
text: They ain't cappin' that this to do list app got lots of going on. I'm actually using this everyday lol.
